CHAT.comment: TRAFFIX DEVICES, INC., Petitioner v. MARKETING DISPLAYS, INC.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN G. ROBERTS, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAWRENCE G. WALLACE ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN A. ARTZ ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN G. ROBERTS, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
